question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. fan
B. fridge
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The fan is on the right side of the image and appears in the foreground, while the fridge is in the background on the left side, making the fan clearly closer to the camera.
